name: Bandit Rush
description:
Bandit Rush is in endless runner which was made as a project for a Mobile Development class in my senior year of college. 

When I had shared it with my peers, the reception of the game was so great that I had decided, 2 months later, to fix up the project, squash the major bugs and publish it.

Planned Features

  • More obstacles
  • More enemies
  • Settings menu
  • A way to delete high score
  • More levels(?)
  • Slide mechanic(?)

Feedback Forum: https://forms.gle/jrmh3o9JebFSUdHHA

ANYTHING VISUAL RELATED CREDIT GOES TO ALL ARTISTS
(If you are one of the artists, please send me a DM on twitter, @Squizyton, or send me a message on here, so I may give you credit on this page :), I used a lot of art )

CURRENT VERSION 1.0
